price: 36. Badanaa inta fac aan halaagnay iyaga hortood, kuwaasoo ahaa kuwo ka xoog badan oo dhulalka xulay. Ma jirto meel (Alle) laga magan galo oo looga cararo.
arabic: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡنٍ هُمۡ أَشَدُّ مِنۡهُم بَطۡشٗا فَنَقَّبُواْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ هَلۡ مِن مَّحِيصٍ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wakam ahlaknā qablahum min qarnin hum ashaddu min'hum baṭshan fanaqqabū fī al-bilādi hal min maḥīṣin
